original: de 'dod chags kyis gzir bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de 'dod chags kyis gzir bar mi 'gyur te /

analyzed: zhe sdang gis ma yin / gti mug gis ma yin / nga rgyal gyis ma yin /
translated: or by anger,🔽or by ignorance,

analyzed: ser snas ma yin / khro bas ma yin /
translated: or by pride,🔽or by envy,🔽or by wrath,

original: gnod @248a *// sems kyis ma yin te /
analyzed: gnod @248a *// sems kyis ma yin te /

analyzed: de skyes ma thag tu mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro //

original: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will attain the acceptance of the nonarising of phenomena.

original: skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa /
analyzed: skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa /
translated: “King of Stars, Flower in Full Bloom,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas /
translated: when the bodhisattva mahāsattva attains the acceptance of the nonarising of phenomena,

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gang+g'a'i klung bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed mthong bar 'gyur ro //

original: mig gi dbang po yongs su dag pa gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong bar 'gyur ba de 'dra bar mig gi dbang po yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mig gi dbang po yongs su dag pa gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong bar 'gyur ba de 'dra bar mig gi dbang po yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will attain the pure eye faculty, and with that pure eye faculty he will see those buddha bhagavāns.”

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang de la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang de la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur te /

original: gang khyod kyis dam pa'i chos padma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas /
analyzed: gang khyod kyis dam pa'i chos padma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas /
translated: “You have heard this Dharma teaching of The White Lotus of the Good Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa de'i gsung rab la lung mnos pa dang / kha ton byas pa dang / bsgoms pa dang / bsams pa dang / yid la byas pa dang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa de'i gsung rab la lung mnos pa dang / kha ton byas pa dang / bsgoms pa dang / bsams pa dang / yid la byas pa dang /
translated: You have received the transmission of the teaching of the bhagavān, the tathāgata, the arhat, the perfectly enlightened buddha Śākyamuni, and you have recited it, contemplated it, meditated on it, and kept it in mind.

original: sems can gzhan dag la'ang rab tu bstan pa /🔽rigs kyi bu legs so //
analyzed: sems can gzhan dag la'ang rab tu bstan pa / rigs kyi bu legs so //
translated: You have also taught it to other beings.🔽“Noble one, it is excellent, excellent, that you have done this.

original: legs so // rigs kyi bu khyod kyi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di ni mes tshig pa'am chus khyer bar mi nus so //
analyzed: legs so // rigs kyi bu khyod kyi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di ni mes tshig pa'am chus khyer bar mi nus so //
translated: Noble one, this accumulation of merit cannot be burned by fire or carried away by water.

original: rigs kyi bu khyod kyi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas @248b brgya stong gis kyang bshad par mi nus so //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu khyod kyi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas @248b brgya stong gis kyang bshad par mi nus so //
translated: Noble one, this accumulation of merit cannot be described even by a thousand buddhas.

original: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdud phyir rgol ba bcom mo //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdud phyir rgol ba bcom mo //
translated: “Son of noble family, you have defeated the māras and adversaries.

original: srid pa'i rgya mtsho las brgal to //
analyzed: srid pa'i rgya mtsho las brgal to //
translated: You have crossed the ocean of existence.

original: dgra'i tsher ma dkrugs so //
analyzed: dgra'i tsher ma dkrugs so //
translated: You have uprooted the thorns of the enemies.

original: sangs rgyas brgya stong gis byin gyis brlabs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas brgya stong gis byin gyis brlabs so //
translated: You have been blessed by a hundred thousand buddhas.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na khyod 'dra ba med do //
analyzed: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na khyod 'dra ba med do //
translated: there is no one in the world, including the gods, who is like you.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu ma gtogs par gzhan nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas sam byang chub sems dpa' gang gis kyang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu ma gtogs par gzhan nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas sam byang chub sems dpa' gang gis kyang /
translated: Except for the Thus-Gone One himself, no one else—whether a hearer, a solitary buddha, or a bodhisattva—

original: khyod la bsod nams kyis kyang rung /🔽ye shes kyis kyang rung /
analyzed: khyod la bsod nams kyis kyang rung / ye shes kyis kyang rung /

analyzed: shes rab kyis kyang rung / ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang rung ste / zil gyis gnon par mi nus so //
translated: or absorption.

original: skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa /
analyzed: skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa /
translated: “Nakṣatra­rāja­saṃkusumitābhi­jña,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa 'di lta bu thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa 'di lta bu thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva who possesses this kind of generation of the power of wisdom will attain it.”

original: skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa /
analyzed: skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa /
translated: King of Stars, Fully Awakened Flower of Cognition,

original: gang la las sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa thos nas /
analyzed: gang la las sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa thos nas /
translated: if someone hears this chapter of the past lives of the King of Physicians explained,

original: legs so // legs so zhes bya ba byin pa de'i kha nas autpa la'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: legs so // legs so zhes bya ba byin pa de'i kha nas autpa la'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: and says Excellent, excellent, the scent of utpala flowers will come from his mouth.

original: de'i lus las kyang tsandan gyi dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa na legs so zhes bya ba byin pa de'i chos can gyi yon tan gyi phan yon de dag ni /
analyzed: de'i lus las kyang tsandan gyi dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro // gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa na legs so zhes bya ba byin pa de'i chos can gyi yon tan gyi phan yon de dag ni /
translated: And the scent of sandalwood will come from his body.🔽Those who say Excellent! when this Dharma discourse is being explained will have those qualities and benefits of the Dharma that I have now explained.

original: ngas da ltar gang dag bshad pa de 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ngas da ltar gang dag bshad pa de 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be just like that.

original: skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa /
analyzed: skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa /
translated: King of Stars, Fully Awakened Flower of Cognition,

original: de lta bas @249a *//
analyzed: de lta bas @249a *//
translated: therefore,

original: na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di ci nas /
analyzed: na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di ci nas /
translated: this chapter of the past lives of the bodhisattva mahāsattva Sarva­sattva­priya­darśana should be taught to the assembly.

original: phyi mi'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dzambu'i gling 'di na spyod cing nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdud sdig can gyis glags mi rnyed pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
analyzed: phyi mi'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dzambu'i gling 'di na spyod cing nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdud sdig can gyis glags mi rnyed pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
translated: In the future, in the final five hundred years, they will be practiced in this world and will not disappear.🔽They will not be found by Māra, the evil one, and the gods, nāgas, yakṣas, and rākṣasas of Māra’s class will not be able to disturb them.

original: dri za dang / grul bum rnams kyis glags mi rnyed par bya ba'i phyir ngas khyod la yongs su gtad do //
analyzed: dri za dang / grul bum rnams kyis glags mi rnyed par bya ba'i phyir ngas khyod la yongs su gtad do //
translated: I entrust you with this so that it will be practiced in this Jambudvīpa in the later final five hundred years, so that it will not disappear, so that Māra will not find an opportunity, and so that the devas, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, and kumbhāṇḍas of Māra’s class will not find an opportunity.

original: skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa /
analyzed: skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa /
translated: “Nakṣatra­rāja­saṃkusumitābhi­jña,

analyzed: de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dzambu'i gling 'dir sems can nad pa nad kyis btab pa rnams la sman lta bur 'gyur bar byin gyis brlabs par byas te /
translated: I have empowered this Dharma teaching to be like medicine for beings in this Jambudvīpa who are sick and afflicted by illness.

original: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas lus la nad kyi mi zug go /🔽rga bas ma yin /
analyzed: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas lus la nad kyi mi zug go / rga bas ma yin /
translated: When they hear this Dharma teaching, their bodies will be free of illness.🔽They will be free of old age.

original: dus ma yin par 'chi bas ma yin no //
analyzed: dus ma yin par 'chi bas ma yin no //
translated: They will be free of untimely death.

original: skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa /
analyzed: skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa /
translated: King of Stars, Flower of Complete Awakening, with Supernormal Knowledge,

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la las mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong de lta bu de mthong na /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la las mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong de lta bu de mthong na /

analyzed: de la tsandan gyi phye ma dang / autpa la sngon pos mngon par gtor bar bya'o //

analyzed: mngon par gtor nas kyang 'di snyam du rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur /

original: 'di ni rtsva len par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di ni rtsva len par 'gyur /
translated: He will gather the grass.

original: 'di ni @249b byang chub kyi snying por rtsva 'ding bar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di ni @249b byang chub kyi snying por rtsva 'ding bar 'gyur /
translated: He will spread out the grass on the seat of awakening.

original: 'di ni bdud kyi phyogs pham par byed par 'gyur /🔽'di ni chos kyi dung 'bud par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di ni bdud kyi phyogs pham par byed par 'gyur / 'di ni chos kyi dung 'bud par 'gyur /
translated: He will defeat the forces of Māra.🔽He will blow the conch of the Dharma.

original: 'di ni chos kyi rnga brdung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di ni chos kyi rnga brdung bar 'gyur /
translated: He will beat the drum of the Dharma.

original: 'di ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o //
translated: He will cross the ocean of saṃsāra.'

original: skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa /
analyzed: skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa /
translated: King of Stars, Flower Fully Bloomed, with Supernormal Knowledge,

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pas /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pas /
translated: Son of a good family or daughter of a good family who has set out in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas,

analyzed: mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong mthong nas de ltar sems bskyed par byas te /
translated: having seen a monk who holds a sutra such as this, should arouse the mind in this way:

analyzed: de ltar na de'i yon tan dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas ci 'dra ba dag bshad pa de 'dra ba dag tu 'gyur ro //
translated: 'In that way, his qualities will become like those explained by the Tathagata.'

original: sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na /
analyzed: sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na /
translated: When this chapter of the past lives of King of Physicians was explained,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong gis sgra thams cad la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob par gyur to //
translated: eighty-four thousand bodhisattvas attained the dharani endowed with skill in all sounds.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang des kyang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang des kyang /
translated: The Blessed One, the Tathagata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, the One of Abundant Jewels, also said:

original: skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa /
analyzed: skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa /
translated: King of Stars, Flower Fully Bloomed, with Supernormal Knowledge,

original: de ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan gyi chos dris pa legs so //
analyzed: de ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan gyi chos dris pa legs so //
translated: “Excellent, excellent! You have asked the Tathāgata about the Dharma of inconceivable good qualities.

original: legs so zhes bya ba byin no //🔽dam pa'i chos padma dkar po las /
analyzed: legs so zhes bya ba byin no // dam pa'i chos padma dkar po las /
translated: and he gave his approval, saying, Excellent!🔽🔽In the Saddharmapundarika-sutra,🔽

original: sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o ////🔽de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom @250a *//
analyzed: sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o //// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom @250a *//
translated: This concludes “The Chapter of the Medicine King’s Past Practices” from “The Lotus Sutra on the Wondrous Dharma.🔽”🔽Chapter  The Lifespan of the Tathāgata🔽Then the Bhagavān Śākyamuni Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One,

original: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pas de'i tshe /
analyzed: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pas de'i tshe /
translated: at that time,

original: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od phyung ste /
analyzed: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od phyung ste /
translated: emitted a light from the ūrṇā hair between his eyebrows.

analyzed: 'od des shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+g'a'i klung bco brgyad kyi bye ma snyed dag khyab par byas te /
translated: That light pervaded the eastern direction, illuminating buddha-realms as numerous as the sands of eighteen Ganges Rivers.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+g'a'i klung bco brgyad kyi bye ma snyed de dag 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba de na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+g'a'i klung bco brgyad kyi bye ma snyed de dag 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba de na /
translated: Beyond those buddhafields, as numerous as the grains of sand in eighteen Ganges Rivers, there is a world system called Array of the Light Rays of Vairocana.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas padma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas padma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la /
translated: In that world system there is a thus-gone one, a worthy one, a perfect buddha called Stainless Lotus Petals, King of Stars, with Blossoming Flowers.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rgya chen po tshad med pas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rgya chen po tshad med pas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to //
translated: He lives and resides there, surrounded and revered by an immeasurable and vast saṅgha of bodhisattvas, teaching the Dharma.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa des mdzod spu nas 'od gang btang ba des /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa des mdzod spu nas 'od gang btang ba des /
translated: Then, the light that the blessed, thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddha Śākyamuni emitted from his forehead

original: de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to //
translated: At that time, the world realm Adorned with the Radiance of Light was filled with a great light.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa de na /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa de na /
translated: In the world realm Adorned with the Radiance of Light,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa /
translated: there was a bodhisattva mahāsattva named Gadgadasvara, who had planted roots of virtue,

original: sngon yang @250b de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po'i 'od zer de lta bu mthong zhing /
analyzed: sngon yang @250b de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po'i 'od zer de lta bu mthong zhing /
translated: and who had seen such light rays from many tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas in the past.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis ting nge 'dzin mang po thob pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis ting nge 'dzin mang po thob pa 'di lta ste /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva Gadgadasvara had attained many samādhis, such as:

original: rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin thob /
analyzed: rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin thob /
translated: he had attained the samādhi called “banner-top ornament,”

original: dam pa'i chos padma dkar po'i ting nge 'dzin thob /
